vlive.korean: 그리고 이 예가 너무 현실감 있는 예였어요. Also, the "yes" was a very realistic one. 듣기 View video NCT의 night night! : 미리 만나는 도요일♥ 도다제 녹음현장! with 도영
vlive.english: Also, the "yes" was a very realistic one.

vlive.korean: 현실감이 없어. This doesn't seem real. 듣기 View video 졸잼티비 (joLjamTV) : [캐남] 하늘을 날고, 바다를 걷고_14회
여러분 현실감 있지 않나요? Was that realistic? 듣기 View video C-JeS : '샤리안' 김준수가 보낸 <도리안 그레이> 대기실 초대장!
그때 뭔가 좀 그냥 진짜 현실감이 있었죠. It felt real. 듣기 View video ASTRO : 은우로운밤
현실감이 없거든요. It's hard to feel true to nature. 듣기 View video V Special : SBS파워FM 오늘같은밤 힙합위크LIVE: 슬리피X딥플로우X베이식
vlive.english: It's hard to feel true to nature.

examples.korean: The naturalness of the dialogue made the book so true to life. 발음듣기 그 책은 대화의 자연스러움 덕분에 대단히 현실감이 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The naturalness of the dialogue made the book so true to life. 발음

examples.korean: Away from Hollywood, he relies on his family and friends to keep him grounded. 발음듣기 그는 할리우드를 벗어나서 가족과 친구들에게 기대어 현실감을 유지한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Away from Hollywood, he relies on his family and friends to keep him grounded. 발음

examples.korean: The scheme is not realistic. 발음듣기 그 계획은 현실감이 없다. 절대어휘 5100
examples.english: The scheme is not realistic. 발음

examples.korean: I think he’s lost his sense of reality. 발음듣기 나는 그가 현실감의 상실했다고 생각한다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: I think he’s lost his sense of reality. 발음

examples.korean: His story has no sense of reality. 발음듣기 그의 이야기는 전혀 현실감이 없다 Neungyule
examples.english: His story has no sense of reality. 발음
